abstract: A one-train trip becomes a two-train one for many weekend travelers.
snippet: A one-train trip becomes a two-train one for many weekend travelers.
lead_paragraph: The failure of a 100-year-old drawbridge over the Norwalk River in Norwalk, Conn., disrupted service on Sunday afternoon for hundreds of rail travelers who were forced take shuttle buses when more than six trains could not cross the river.

headline.main: Drawbridge in Connecticut Becomes Stuck, Disrupting Metro-North and Amtrak
